alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 8:07PM CDT until April 29 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Above Groesbeck affecting Limestone County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River Above Groesbeck. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Moderate overbank flow is expected, with flooding occurring along the left bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:55 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1.9 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 9.6 feet late tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
